summary: Netflix and Marvel Drop First Official Trailer for Daredevil Season 3 as New York Comic Con Kicks Off
title: Netflix and Marvel Drop First Official Trailer for Daredevil Season 3 as New York Comic Con Kicks Off
body:
Netflix and Marvel Drop First Official Trailer for Daredevil Season 3 as New York Comic Con Kicks Off

Netflix just dropped their first official trailer for Marvel’s Daredevil Season 3.

Take a look:

The trailer continues the promise of a much darker season as Vincent D’Onofrio’s Wilson Fisk aka Kingpin is out of prison and he’s got his sights set on Daredevil. Not only does he have his sights set on Daredevil, but it definitely…

View On WordPress

title:
RT @JoeQuesada: Face Front True Believers!

There's going to be a special Marvel Knights 20th Anniversary signing at the Marvel booth!

Tomorrow, Friday 10/5 @10:30 AM
@jpalmiotti, Christopher Priest, Tom Sniegoski and myself will be there.

Oh, and EVERYONE there will bet this FREE MK poster!!! https://t.co/2SI55XEcwE

Safe for work blog dedicated to Marvel symbiotes from Anti-Venom to ZZZXX, keeping you up to date with all the latest symbiote news and fan art. Questions about anything are also welcomed!

Tag List, TheVenomSite, Comics

summary:
Today at NYCC, the covers for Venom #10 and Web of Venom: Venom Unleashed were shown off.
After it’s apparent demise, it appears...
body:
Today at NYCC, the covers for Venom #10 and Web of Venom: Venom Unleashed were shown off.

After it’s apparent demise, it appears the Venom symbiote will bond with a dog and find its way back to Eddie who is now in San Francisco again judging by The Golden Gate Bridge on issue 10’s cover.

reblog.comment:
